mapper.update: update pkpm_cloud_video_capture set cap_type = #{capType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cap_value = #{capValue,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where cap_id = #{capId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cap_id, cap_type, cap_value from pkpm_cloud_video_capture where cap_id = #{capId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select cap_id, cap_type, cap_value from pkpm_cloud_video_capture
